ieee8021EcmpMib.name: ieee8021EcmpMib

revisions.description: Incorporated into 802.1Q 2014 Revision. Cross-references and front matter updated.
802.1 Equal Cost Multiple Paths MIB Initial Version

ieee8021EcmpMib.contactinfo: WG-URL: http://grouper.ieee.org/groups/802/1/index.html WG-EMail: stds-802-1@ieee.org Contact: IEEE 802.1 Working Group Chair Postal: C/O IEEE 802.1 Working Group IEEE Standards Association 445 Hoes Lane P.O. Box 1331 Piscataway NJ 08855-1331 USA E-mail: STDS-802-1-L@LISTSERV.IEEE.ORG

ieee8021QBridgeEcmpFdbTable.name: ieee8021QBridgeEcmpFdbTable
ieee8021QBridgeEcmpFdbTable.description: A table that contains information about unicast entries for which the device has forwarding and/or filtering information. This information is used by the ECMP next hop selection function in determining how to propagate a received frame.

ieee8021QBridgeEcmpFdbEntry.name: ieee8021QBridgeEcmpFdbEntry
ieee8021QBridgeEcmpFdbEntry.description: Information about a specific unicast MAC address for which the device has some forwarding and/or filtering information.

ieee8021QBridgeEcmpFdbPortList.name: ieee8021QBridgeEcmpFdbPortList
ieee8021QBridgeEcmpFdbPortList.description: The complete set of ports, in this FID, to which frames destined for this individual MAC address may be forwarded.

ieee8021EcmpFlowFilterCtlTable.name: ieee8021EcmpFlowFilterCtlTable
ieee8021EcmpFlowFilterCtlTable.description: A table flow filtering control informmation for ports in a Bridge supporting F-Tag processing.

ieee8021EcmpFlowFilterCtlEntry.name: ieee8021EcmpFlowFilterCtlEntry
ieee8021EcmpFlowFilterCtlEntry.description: An entry in the Flow Filtering Control Table for a port (CPB or PNP).

ieee8021EcmpFlowFilterCtlVid.name: ieee8021EcmpFlowFilterCtlVid
ieee8021EcmpFlowFilterCtlVid.description: A B-vID registered on the port.

ieee8021EcmpFlowFilterCtlEnabled.name: ieee8021EcmpFlowFilterCtlEnabled
ieee8021EcmpFlowFilterCtlEnabled.description: Indicates whether or not flow filtering behavior is enabled on the port for the VID (true(1) is enabled, false(2) is disabled).

ieee8021EcmpFlowFilterCtlHashGen.name: ieee8021EcmpFlowFilterCtlHashGen
ieee8021EcmpFlowFilterCtlHashGen.description: indicates whether or not flow hash generation is enabled on the port for the VID (true(1) is enabled, false(2) is disabled).

ieee8021EcmpFlowFilterCtlTtl.name: ieee8021EcmpFlowFilterCtlTtl
ieee8021EcmpFlowFilterCtlTtl.description: the initial TTL value for frames entering the flow filtering SPT Domain. Valid values are 1..63, zero indicates the value has not been set. This object is persistent.

ieee8021EcmpEctStaticTable.name: ieee8021EcmpEctStaticTable
ieee8021EcmpEctStaticTable.description: Table containing alternate Bridge priorities for tie-breaker masks used in selecting shared tree root bridges. The table is indexed by - ieee8021SpbTopIx from ieee8021SpbMtidStaticTable indicating the ISIS-SPB topology instance into which the bridge priority will be advertised, and - ieee8021EcmpEctStaticEntryTieBreakMask the associated tie-break mask value.

ieee8021EcmpEctStaticEntry.name: ieee8021EcmpEctStaticEntry
ieee8021EcmpEctStaticEntry.description: This entry contains information about backbone services configured on this system to be advertised by ISIS-SPB.

ieee8021EcmpEctStaticEntryTieBreakMask.name: ieee8021EcmpEctStaticEntryTieBreakMask
ieee8021EcmpEctStaticEntryTieBreakMask.description: The value used to create the Tie-Break Mask for selecting a shared tree root bridge.

ieee8021EcmpEctStaticEntryBridgePriority.name: ieee8021EcmpEctStaticEntryBridgePriority
ieee8021EcmpEctStaticEntryBridgePriority.description: A Bridge Priority value to be used for selecting a shared tree root bridge, i.e. the most significant 4 bits of the Bridge Identifier. This object is persistent.

ieee8021EcmpEctStaticEntryRowStatus.name: ieee8021EcmpEctStaticEntryRowStatus
ieee8021EcmpEctStaticEntryRowStatus.description: This column holds the status for this row. When the status is active, no columns of this table may be modified. All columns must have a valid value before the row can be activated. This object is persistent.

ieee8021EcmpTopSrvTable.name: ieee8021EcmpTopSrvTable
ieee8021EcmpTopSrvTable.description: Added info for SPBM PBB encapsulated services in this network.

ieee8021EcmpTopSrvEntry.name: ieee8021EcmpTopSrvEntry
ieee8021EcmpTopSrvEntry.description: This table contains additional information about backbone services configured on this system to be advertised by ISIS-SPB.

ieee8021EcmpTopSrvEntryTsBit.name: ieee8021EcmpTopSrvEntryTsBit
ieee8021EcmpTopSrvEntryTsBit.description: If true(1), indicates the BSI transmits multicast frames on a shared tree from this CBP.

ieee8021EcmpTopSrvEntryTieBreakMask.name: ieee8021EcmpTopSrvEntryTieBreakMask
ieee8021EcmpTopSrvEntryTieBreakMask.description: The value used to create the Tie-Break Mask for calculating multicast trees.

ieee8021QBridgePortVlanTtlStatisticsTabl.name: ieee8021QBridgePortVlanTtlStatisticsTable
ieee8021QBridgePortVlanTtlStatisticsTabl.description: A table containing per-port, per-VID TTL discard statistics.

ieee8021QBridgePortVlanTtlStatisticsEntr.name: ieee8021QBridgePortVlanTtlStatisticsEntry
ieee8021QBridgePortVlanTtlStatisticsEntr.description: TTL discard statistics for a VID on an interface.

ieee8021QBridgeTpVlanPortTtlDiscards.name: ieee8021QBridgeTpVlanPortTtlDiscards
ieee8021QBridgeTpVlanPortTtlDiscards.description: The number of valid frames received by this port from its segment that were classified as belonging to this VLAN and that were discarded due to TTL expiry. Discontinuities in the value of the counter can occur at re-initialization of the management system, and at other times as indicated by the value of ifCounterDiscontinuityTime object of the associated interface (if any).

ieee8021QBridgeEcmpFdbGroup.name: ieee8021QBridgeEcmpFdbGroup
ieee8021QBridgeEcmpFdbGroup.description: FDB Port Map for ECMP Individual address

ieee8021EcmpFlowFilterCtlGroup.name: ieee8021EcmpFlowFilterCtlGroup
ieee8021EcmpFlowFilterCtlGroup.description: Flow filtering control parameters on a CBP or PNP

ieee8021EcmpEctStaticGroup.name: ieee8021EcmpEctStaticGroup
ieee8021EcmpEctStaticGroup.description: Optional Bridge Priority for selecting shared tree root

ieee8021EcmpTopSrvGroup.name: ieee8021EcmpTopSrvGroup
ieee8021EcmpTopSrvGroup.description: Advertised I-SID parameters controlling multicast routing

ieee8021EcmpFlowFilteringCompliance.name: ieee8021EcmpFlowFilteringCompliance
ieee8021EcmpFlowFilteringCompliance.description: Compliance to IEEE 802.1 SPBM ECMP with flow filtering
